item.description:
Would you like to know exactly what your Silver Seed is?

 

How about where it is located?


And most important, how to awaken it? 

 

The option to do so will no longer be available after Dec. 2012, so... 

 

THE  TIME IS NOW...

to restore your original organic capabities for perpetual health, wellness, and ascension.


This is where you will learn how... and MUCH MORE!

We will be joining with members of another Meetup called "Self, Spirituality, and the Silver Seed Awakening" to study this topic. 

This Meetup runs from 6 PM - 9 PM. 

Please bring your own refreshments, and check this site for last minute cancellations before leaving.

                         ******

Additional Details follow:

This information will later be published by the Azurite Press in the form of a book. The (approx) title will be "Earth After 2012, Orb Whisperers, and The Silver Seed Awakening" by Ashayana Deane.

But because TIME IS OF THE ESSENCE, we are studying this info as soon as each segment is released in workshop form.

A series of "Sliders" workshops can be viewed by scrolling down on this link:

http://www.azuritepress.com/products_us/list%20pages/sliders_series.php

While viewing those titles, check out the contents of Sliders 10, 11, and 12 which will be viewed and discussed in detail during our group Meetups.

That's because this is where the detailed info on the silver seed awakening is given, including the necessary techniques. However, it is also recommended that members start studying the earlier Slilders workshops in preparation, as well as Kathara level 1-4.

THE IMPLICATIONS OF THIS INFORMATION ARE IMMENSE!

These technicals describe exactly WHAT our Silver Seed is, WHERE it is located, why it has not been functioning properly since the days of Atlantis... and how correct the mutation to restore our ancient organic capabilities... before the window of opportunity to do so closes Dec 21, 2012.
item.how_to_find_us: Go up first driveway and enter through front door. Go on downstairs and have a seat in waiting room or classroom.
item.name: The Silver Seed Awakening
